concept.title: Understanding workflows
concept.shortdesc: uses YAML workflows to define the steps in an application deployment.

conbody.p: Each step in a workflow performs a distinct action and runs in its own container. You can use steps to provision resources, deploy applications, or execute tasks.

When you run a workflow, executes each step using a Tekton pipeline. executes all steps simultaneously unless you explicitly define a sequential order for the steps to run in. For more information on explicit step ordering, see Writing a workflow.
